dcterms:description: The Penn Discourse TreeBank 2.0 is a resource for discourse parsing that provides annotated text for various discourse relations.
dcterms:title: Penn Discourse TreeBank (PDTB)

dcterms:description: The Chinese Discourse TreeBank is a resource for discourse parsing in Chinese, providing annotated text for various discourse relations.
dcterms:title: Chinese Discourse TreeBank (CDTB)

dcterms:description: The English blind dataset is used for evaluating the performance of discourse sense classification models, focusing on blind datasets.
